sentences.en: All the pages are abundantly illustrated with colour photographs.
sentences.cn: 每页都配有丰富的彩色照片。

sentences.en: And their courage and ferocity have been abundantly displayed on these occasions.
sentences.cn: 在这种场合中,爱斯基摩人显示出的既有勇敢的一面,也有残忍的一面.

sentences.en: Both AdipoR 1 and AdipoR 2 are abundantly expressed in human skeletal muscle.
sentences.cn: 人脂联素受体AdipoR1和AdipoR2均在骨骼肌丰富表达.

sentences.en: Calcium is found most abundantly in milk.
France is abundantly supplied with excellent family-run hotels.
sentences.cn: 法国有很多相当不错的家庭旅馆。

sentences.en: I am abundantly provided for as I follow my path.
sentences.cn: 当我踏上道途,我被丰富地供给所需的一切.
我已经把我的意思说得明明白白.

sentences.en: It is both cheap and abundantly available.
sentences.cn: 它不仅便宜而且产量丰富.

sentences.en: May you and your whole family be abundantly blessed this year!
sentences.cn: 愿你和你全家今年祝福满满!

sentences.en: Melons grow abundantly in this region.
Parsons used the lavatory , loudly and abundantly.
sentences.cn: 派逊斯大声痛快地用了便盆.

sentences.en: Picking off flowers frequently encourage most annuals to flower more abundantly.
sentences.cn: 经常摘掉残花,会让大多数一年生植物更多地开花.

sentences.en: She made her wishes abundantly clear.
sentences.cn: 她充分表明了她的意愿。

sentences.en: She made her wishes abundantly clear.
sentences.cn: 她充分表明了她的意思.

sentences.en: Sulfur is found abundantly in volcanic regions.
sentences.cn: 硫在火山地区大量存在.

sentences.en: These proteins, they knew, are produced abundantly in the obese.
sentences.cn: 研究人员了解在肥胖者体内这些蛋白质大量产生.

trans.tran_cn: 丰富地，大量地，十分清楚，非常明白
